message: yea I'm looking forward to playing with Drivers a bit
The change log in the user guide is where I really learned about all the changes, but I am still working through my apps making sure that they are all updated for v2
there's also a blog entry covering some "high level" changes (if you haven't seen it): http://codeigniter.com/news/codeigniter_2.0.0_released/
I have also been having a lot of fun coding on my CR-48.. Too many new things to play with. I have CI2 on my server and making a lot of progress updating my communication app.

I think the biggest change is making the system folder the "system" folder, now there is no longer the need to remove the application folder because it is in the codeigniter root.. I am also testing out the new caching library. I have been doing caching within my own models using a static cache variable in each, but this seems to get rid of the need for it.
Do you have any web apps running Codeigniter 2 yet?
Guys, I have one existing CI site which is using version 1.7. Do I need to upgrade my old CI into CI2? Whats the big difference using old CI version and the latest one?
There isn't too much of a difference, I am just making sure to do a lot of testing before and adding support for the new caching driver.
